amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be obligated or expended to implement the Convention on the Prohibition of the Use, Stockpiling, Production and Transfer of Anti-Personnel Mines and on their Destruction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to be obligated or expended to implement the Convention on the Prohibition of the Use, Stockpiling, Production and Transfer of Anti-Personnel Mines and on their Destruction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Forbes amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Forbes amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Forbes.
